contents.content: At this point you may be thinking: But how do I know when an image looks “correct?” The good news is that there is no one correct image. There are many ways to construct an image that combines a pleasing aesthetic with a science message. Here are three different images of M33. These three images are different from each other because they were made using different filters, chromatic ordering sequences, and color balances:
